Rezerve: Rezerve is a user-friendly platform allowing customers to find salons around them and book an appointment there.
ofSalon: of salon appointments are booked outside of business hours.
salonClient: 80% of salon clients prefer to book appointments online
onlineBooking: Online booking reduces appointment scheduling errors by 90%
whoWeDesc:
Rezerve is your one-stop platform for all things beauty. 

We connect you with a wide selection of beauty professionals, making it easier than ever to find the perfect service for your needs. 

From hairstyling and makeup artistry to massage therapy and skincare treatments, Rezerve empowers you to discover new places and book appointments for a wide range of beauty services, all in one convenient place. 

We believe everyone deserves to feel confident and beautiful. 

Rezerve is here to simplify your beauty routine and help you to shine even more!
missionvalueDesc:
Rezerve was born from a desire to revolutionize the beauty industry. 

We believe in creating a seamless connection between clients and beauty professionals. 

Our platform fosters a supportive community that empowers both beauty enthusiasts and skilled professionals. 

Our platform will help you find new trends and styles and connect you to the professionals that offer such services. 

Rezerve is committed to transparency and user-friendliness, allowing you to find the perfect place and service for you.
joinTo: Join our exclusive waitlist and be catapulted to the front of the pack. You won't just be one of the first to experience REZERVE, you'll be part of a select group who gets to shape the future with valuable early feedback.
joinToShort: Join our exclusive waitlist and be catapulted to the front of the pack. You won't just be one of the first to experience REZERVE, you'll be part of a select group who gets to shape the future with valuable early feedback.
userFeaturPara1: Ditch the back-and-forth emails and phone calls. Our app lets you book appointments directly with your favorite sellers in seconds.
userFeaturPara2: Never miss an appointment again! Get automatic notifications to keep you on top of your schedule.
userFeaturPara3: Find the right salon for your needs. Filter by ratings, location, and reviews to find your perfect match.
userFeaturPara4: Be the first to discover the latest trending styles and stay ahead of your peers.
userFeaturPara5: Don't miss out! Join the waitlist for popular sellers and be notified of opening slots.
userFeaturPara6: Pay securely within the app for a smooth and convenientexperience.
userFeaturPara7: Browse through a variety of salon professionals' portfolios to discover their unique styles and find the perfect match).
userFeaturPara8: Access a vast network of salons, all in one place.
userFeaturPara9: Set up recurring appointments in seconds, say goodbye to constant rescheduling.
SellonePara1: Simplify your daily grind with powerful tools and clear analytics to track your salon's success.
SellonePara2: Sell services and retail items seamlessly within the app, creating a one-stop shop for your clients.
SellonePara3: Manage your staffs and clients effortlessly with our intuitive interface, saving you valuable time.
SelloneHeading4: Reach New Clients & Retain Existing Ones
SellonePara4: Leverage built-in marketing tools like our intuitive story uploads, boosting, to attract new customers and keep your existing ones coming back for more.
SellonePara5: Whether you're a single salon or a large franchise, our app adapts to your business.
SelloneHeading6: Get All This & More, Without Breaking the Bank
SellonePara6: Enjoy a suite of features designed to streamline your salon and boost your profits, all at an affordable price.
SellonePara7: Experience the power of our app firsthand with a no-obligation free trial.
afterSignUp: You're on the exclusive waitlist for Rezerve!
afterSignupPara: Don't call it waiting, call it VIP access!
afterSignUpDesc: While you get special access to sneak peeks, behind-the-scenes content, and exciting surprises, your interest fuels our team to create an unforgettable experience
afterSignUpSubHead: Here's what being on the waitlist gets you:
afterSignUpP1: Early access: Be among the first to know when we launch.
afterSignUpP2: Insider look: Get a sneak peek at what we're building and see the magic behind the curtain.
afterSignUpP3: The VIP treatment: Stay tuned for special surprises and content designed just for our waitlist members.
afterSignUpBottom: Join the community and get ready for something amazing!
